text: A puppy has 22 bones. It buries 7 and then finds 4 more. How many bones does it have now?
A squirrel gathers 18 nuts, drops 5, and then collects 3 more. How many nuts does it end with?
A zoo has 25 birds. 9 fly away but 6 new birds arrive. How many birds now?
A rabbit finds 17 carrots, eats 6, and later finds 2 more. How many carrots remain?
A dog chases 14 balls in the yard, loses 5, then finds 4 under a bush. How many balls does it have?
An astronaut sees 20 stars, then counts 8 more, but 6 are hidden by clouds. How many stars can they still see?
A space rover collects 17 rocks, drops 8, and receives 5 more from another robot. How many rocks now?
A rocket has 24 buttons. Engineers remove 7 and add 3 new ones. How many buttons total?
A moon base has 26 robots. 12 go offline, but 6 are repaired. How many robots are online now?
A starship launches 15 probes, retrieves 4, then sends out 7 more. How many probes are currently out?
A soccer team scores 12 goals in practice, then scores 9 more, but 7 are disallowed. How many goals count?
A basketball team has 23 balls. They lose 9 and buy 6 more. How many balls do they have now?
A baseball player hits 18 balls, misses 7, then hits 4 more. How many total hits did they make?
There are 27 kids running a race. 11 drop out and 8 new kids join. How many runners now?
A swimmer completes 19 laps, rests, then swims 6 more. How many laps total?
A child decorates 21 cookies, eats 5, then decorates 4 more. How many decorated cookies remain?
A holiday tree has 30 ornaments. 12 fall off but 7 are added. How many ornaments now?
A basket has 28 Easter eggs. Kids take 9 and then add 3 more. How many eggs now?
A snowman starts with 16 snowballs, loses 5, then gets 4 more added. How many snowballs now?
A pumpkin patch has 35 pumpkins. Families pick 14 but bring 5 new ones to donate. How many pumpkins?
A child has 22 toy cars, gives away 8, then receives 6 more. How many cars do they have now?
A toy robot has 19 gears. The child removes 6 and adds 5. How many gears now?
A kid builds with 30 blocks, uses 12 on a castle, then adds 7 more blocks. How many blocks remain unused?
A toy store sells 16 dolls, still has 28 left, then gets 9 more. How many dolls are now in the store?
A child has 25 crayons, loses 9, and then gets 4 new crayons. How many crayons remain?
A racetrack has 32 cars racing. 11 drop out but 6 new cars join. How many cars are racing now?
A child lines up 14 blue cars, 9 red cars, and gives 6 away. How many cars remain?
A garage has 26 cars, 8 drive away, and 5 arrive. How many cars now?
A boy sees 18 cars on the road, then sees 11 more, but loses sight of 7. How many does he still see?
A race starts with 29 cars. 12 cars run out of fuel but 4 return after refueling. How many cars race now?
A zoo has 34 animals. They move 12 to a new area and add 9 new animals. How many animals now?
A pond has 21 ducks. 8 swim away, then 6 return. How many ducks now?
A farmer collects 28 eggs, gives away 9, and finds 7 more in the barn. How many eggs does he have?
A dog walker has 17 dogs, 6 go home, and 3 new ones join. How many dogs now?
A turtle sees 20 fish, 9 swim away, then 4 more appear. How many fish does it see now?
An astronaut collects 27 samples, loses 11, then finds 5 more. How many samples remain?
A moon rover has 18 batteries, uses 7, then receives 4 more. How many batteries now?
A spaceship sees 33 asteroids. 15 drift away and 6 come closer. How many asteroids now?
A starship crew counts 12 planets, then sees 14 more, but 9 move out of sight. How many are still visible?
A satellite sends 29 signals, loses 13, and then sends 7 more. How many signals total?
A soccer coach counts 26 cones, removes 8, then adds 5. How many cones now?
A basketball team scores 19 points, then 14 more, but loses 7 points to penalties. How many points count?
A baseball team has 22 bats, breaks 9, and buys 6 more. How many bats now?
A track meet has 31 runners. 12 finish early and leave, but 8 new runners join. How many runners now?
A goalie blocks 17 shots, then blocks 9 more, but 6 don’t count. How many blocks count?
A child makes 18 holiday cards, gives away 7, then makes 6 more. How many cards total?
A holiday train set has 24 pieces. 9 go missing, but 5 are found. How many pieces now?
A basket has 27 candy canes. Kids eat 10 and add 4 more. How many candy canes?
A snowman has 23 snowballs. 12 melt, but 7 new ones are added. How many now?
A family collects 30 lights for decorating. 14 break, and they buy 8 more. How many lights now?
A toy box has 26 cars, 12 trucks, and loses 9 toys total. How many toys remain?
A kid builds with 22 blocks, removes 7, then adds 9 more. How many blocks now?
A set of action figures has 18 heroes and 9 villains. The child loses 6 figures. How many remain?
A toy store stocks 28 items, sells 13, then restocks 9. How many toys now?
A LEGO kit has 40 pieces. 17 are used, 6 are lost. How many are left?
A parking lot has 33 cars. 14 leave but 9 arrive. How many cars now?
A kid counts 21 cars on the road, then sees 15 more but loses sight of 8. How many does the kid see now?
A race has 27 cars. 11 stop for repairs, but 5 return. How many race now?
A collector has 19 toy cars, buys 14 more, but gives 8 away. How many cars remain?
A garage has 28 cars needing repair. Mechanics fix 13, then receive 6 new cars. How many need repair now?
A forest has 29 deer. 12 leave for water, then 7 return. How many deer now?
A pond has 24 frogs. 9 hop away and 6 new frogs hop in. How many frogs now?
A farm harvests 33 apples. Kids eat 11 and pick 5 more. How many apples remain?
A dog pack has 17 dogs, 8 join, and 5 leave. How many dogs are in the pack?
A cat finds 14 toys, loses 6, then finds 5 more under the couch. How many toys now?
A spaceship crew counts 22 stars, then 19 more, but clouds hide 14. How many stars can they see?
A comet passes 18 asteroids and then 16 more. 11 drift away. How many remain nearby?
A space station receives 25 shipments, uses 14, and gets 7 more. How many shipments remain unused?
A moon lab has 29 tools, breaks 9, and gets 6 replacements. How many tools now?
A rover collects 31 samples, sends 15 to Earth, then collects 8 more. How many samples does it have now?
